project-basis: Built on the iOS SDK using the groundwork APIs. Started at 11 am and finished at 5pm.
project-challenges: Groundwork documentation was sparse/out of date.
project-future-plans: Launch on the app store and promote it to Hillary supporters.
project-purpose: Fully integrates with the Groundwork APIs and Facebook to enable volunteers to create events, invite guests, share their event on Facebook and Twitter, manage guests on the day off (mark attendance, create entries for walk-ins)
project-inspiration: My friend, Seeyew Mo who has organized hundreds of events for Hillary has a hard time managing attendees and is required to use many different tools and several manual processes to do so. This app is an attempt to solve his and other hosts' problems.
project-lessons-learned: Talking to volunteers and employees of the Hillary campaign has given me some great insights into their problems.
project-accomplishments: Created a simple, mobile interface to Groundwork that will make managing Hillary events a log more delightful.
project-subtitle: An app to manage political events
